snippet: Lillard had 28 points and 10 assists to lead Portland, which played without the ill LaMarcus Aldridge but handed the Nets their third straight loss to Western Conference teams.
lead_paragraph: Lillard had 28 points and 10 assists to lead Portland, which played without the ill LaMarcus Aldridge but handed the Nets their third straight loss to Western Conference teams.

headline.main: Nets Finish Winless on Trip, Falling to Damian Lillard and Trail Blazers
headline.print_headline: Nets Finish Winless on Trip, Falling to Damian Lillard and Trail Blazers
